name: bogJS
description: A JS framework for object-based rendering in browsers

scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min && npm run build-debug-ui && npm run build-min-ui
scripts.build-release: npm version patch && simplifyify index.js -o dist/bogJS-`git describe --abbrev=0`.js --minify --debug --bundle && simplifyify index-ui.js -o dist/bogJS-ui-`git describe --abbrev=0`.js --minify --debug --bundle && npm run build

author: Michael Weitnauer
